item.title: Mpesb Paramedical Group5 2024
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Madhya Pradesh Employee Selection Board (MPESB) Madhya Pradesh Employee Selection Board (MPESB) MP ESB Group 5 Paramedical & Nursing Staff Recruitment 2024 Short Details of Notification MP ESB Paramedical Group 5 Various Post Recruitment 2025 Application Fee General / Other State : 560/-SC / ST / OBC : 310/-Pay the Exam Fee Through Cash at KIOSK Or Pay Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking Fee Mode Only Important Dates Application Begin : 30/12/2024Last Date : 13/01/2025 Pay Exam Fee Last Date : 13/01/2025Correction Last Date : 18/01/2025MP Group 5 Exam Date Start : 15/02/2025Admit Card Available : Before Exam Eligibility Age Limit as on 01/01/2024 Minimum Age : 18 Years.
